cognitive neuroscientist

about blog

© 2018. All rights reserved.

I recently received my PhD from Binghamton University's Cognitive and Brain Sciences Program. Currently, I'm on the job market and wrapping up some computational modelling/cognitive neuroscience projects. As a member of the Learning and Representation in Cognition (LARC) and Brain and Machine (BAM) Laboratories, I conduct basic and applied research on similarity, categorization and learning with behavioral, computational and electrophysiological methods.
